topics.body:
I been thinking for quite some time now. I never really made a lot of real decisions is my life. What I mean is most of everything I've accomplished and attained is because someone told me to do it. Never had a rebellious phase neither.

I think the only time I made a move on my own is when I said yes to Ivy. And even then it was only when you guys convinced me to do so.

I'm totally fine with it though. [spoiler]Is it because I'm Asian?[/spoiler]
